name: Chronicle of the Polar Night Dynasty
description: The reign of King Harold and Queen Indrid, and the wandering of Princess Freya. Somewhere in the forest, a sealed flask changes hands.

manifest.author: mrklas
manifest.lore: The sun has not risen for three months. In the frozen capital of the Polar Dynasty, King Harold rules with a weary hand. His daughter Freya has vanished into the forest. The court mage Indrid knows something she will not say. And somewhere in the vault, a flask of Wildfire Oil waits for whoever holds the Iron Key.

entities.name: Kingdom of the Polar Night
entities.description: A frozen realm where the sun hides for half the year. Ruled by iron will and older laws.

entities.name: Frostkeep Castle
entities.description: The ancestral seat of the Polar dynasty. Cold stone, warm fires, older secrets.

entities.name: Throne Room
entities.description: Where Harold judges, rules, and occasionally naps on the throne.

entities.name: Great Hall
entities.description: Feasts, councils, and whispered conspiracies beneath mounted antlers.

entities.name: Royal Vault
entities.description: Sealed with the Iron Key. Contains the dynasty's wealth and a few regrets.

entities.name: Whispering Forest
entities.description: Ancient trees, deeper darkness than the polar night itself. Freya knows its paths.

entities.name: King Harold
entities.description: Weathered, stern, and secretly afraid of spiders. Has ruled for thirty-one winters.

entities.name: Queen Indrid
entities.description: Wise beyond her years. Knows three languages, six poisons, and one forbidden spell.

entities.name: Princess Freya
entities.description: Seventeen, heir to the throne, currently missing from court. Probably on purpose.

entities.name: Bygul
entities.description: Freya's kitten — named after the bee-gold of old Norse lore. Uncommonly calm for a creature raised among warriors. Its amber eyes hold no judgment, only warmth.

entities.name: Iron Crown of the North
entities.description: Forged from a fallen star. Heavy enough to humble any king.

entities.name: Frostbite
entities.description: A legendary blade that never rusts. Allegedly drinks cold.

entities.name: Indrid's Staff
entities.description: Carved from a single piece of northern ash. Hums faintly in snowstorms.

entities.name: Silver Dagger
entities.description: A gift from her father on her twelfth birthday. She uses it constantly.

entities.name: Iron Key
entities.description: Opens the Royal Vault. Harold keeps it under his pillow, which worries everyone.

entities.name: Wildfire Oil
entities.description: A sealed clay flask found on a dead wanderer's satchel deep in the forest. Southern trader marks on the wax seal. Freya does not know what it is. Indrid does — and her expression says she wishes Freya had left it in the snow.

entities.name: Gold Coins
entities.description: Currency of the realm. Bears Harold's displeased face on one side.

entities.name: Mana Potions
entities.description: Indrid's personal reserve. Stored in the vault. Do not drink. She will know.

entities.name: Wood
entities.description: Timber gathered from the Whispering Forest.

entities.name: Human
entities.description: A mortal inhabitant of the Polar Night realm. Subject to cold, time, and dynasty.

entities.name: Royalty
entities.description: A member of the reigning dynasty. Carries the weight of blood, duty, and legacy.

entities.name: Weapon
entities.description: An instrument of force. Each carries its own history of hands and wounds.

entities.name: Magical
entities.description: Imbued with arcane energy. Responds to mana and the will of its bearer.

entities.name: Venison
entities.description: Salted game meat from the northern hunt. Keeps the cold at bay.
